testcase.name: should retrieve user inventory with default parameters
should filter by position
should filter by rarity
should filter by min and max overall
should handle pagination correctly
should sort by different fields
should return true if user owns the player
should return false if user does not own the player
should generate correct positions for 4-3-3 formation
should generate correct positions for 4-2-4 formation
should generate correct positions for 5-3-2 formation
should generate correct positions for 3-5-2 formation
should generate correct positions for 4-4-2 formation
should throw error for invalid formation
should allow GK players in GK slots
should not allow FW players in GK slots
should allow DF players in DF slots
should not allow MF players in DF slots
should allow MF players in MF slots
should allow FW players in FW slots
should allow UT (Utility) players in any position
should allow any position on bench
should have all required formations
should have 11 starters and 7 bench for each formation
should always have 1 GK in each formation
should successfully subscribe a valid email with GDPR consent
should handle already subscribed email gracefully
should reject request with invalid email format
should reject request with missing email
should reject request with missing GDPR consent
should reject request with missing timestamp
should reject request with invalid timestamp format
should handle EmailOctopus service failures
should handle unexpected errors gracefully
should handle empty request body
should handle email with special characters
should handle very long email addresses
should create a new squad successfully
should throw error if squad name already exists
should deactivate other squads when is_active is true
should retrieve squad details
should throw error if squad not found
should throw error if user does not own squad
should exclude player stats when include_stats is false
should update lineup successfully
should throw error if squad not found
should throw error if user does not own squad
should throw error if player not in inventory
should throw error for position mismatch
should throw error for duplicate assignment
should successfully subscribe a new email
should handle already subscribed email (409 status)
should handle already subscribed email (error code)
should throw error when EMAILOCTOPUS_API_KEY is missing
should throw error when EMAILOCTOPUS_LIST_ID is missing
should handle API error responses
should handle network errors
should handle 500 server errors
should handle 401 authentication errors
should handle malformed JSON response
should handle timeout errors
should handle emails with unicode characters
should handle empty error object in response
should pass consent timestamp to EmailOctopus
should use correct API endpoint URL
should attach user_id to request when valid UUID provided
should return 401 when no user_id header provided
should return 401 when invalid UUID format provided
should return 401 when empty user_id provided
should handle uppercase UUID
should create squad successfully with valid data
